entry.title: PY18 Sprint 4 Planning
entry.content:
We have been in Kanban mode working to wrap up development of the Alpha Holoseat units. With SyndCon approaching, it is time to get back to running a sprint.

Duration: 8 weeks
Stand Ups: Saturday Mornings
Start: Jun 3, 2018
End: Jul 29, 2018

Backlog and Full Sprint Plan (see Backlog and SyndCon Task List tabs)

We have some very specific tasks we need to get done before SyndCon, not all of which are currently in our backlog. So, we are going to run this sprint from a dedicated task list shown below.

ID Task Responsible
1 Install Glue between Wordpress and social media (twitter/facebook) Bryan
2 Verify wordpress Template plugin Bryan
3 Count all components and order additional materials if needed for 15 total units All
4 Coordinate with Syndcon chair J
5 Make template for stand up status update posts in Wordpress J
6 Make Template for photo social media posts in Wordpress J
7 Make template for re-share posts in Wordpress J
8 Confirm functionality for alternative exercise equipment (other bike) J
9 Confirm functionality for alternative exercise equipment (elliptical) Bryan
10 Message testers to let them know we will have an updated set of terms to sign Bryan
11 Message testers to let them know they will need to purchase their own equipment Bryan
12 Start using templates for stand ups and pics asap (back date posts for stand ups at start) All
13 Bag controller parts for documentation assembly (including feather and its bits) Bryan
14 Build 14 snap fit tone rings J
15 Build 14 controller housings J
16 Build 8 alpha units main systems for delivery Bryan
17 Message testers to let them know we will be delivering at Syndcon Bryan
18 Build 5 more sensors for use at Syndcon J
19 Build 2 alpha units main systems for raffle Bryan
20 Plan demo schedule All
21 Find and pack all items for demos Bryan
22 Build 3-4 (including ours) unit main systems for demos Bryan
23 Generate panel presentation All
24 Generate main meeting presentation All
25 Prep for shipment of alpha units to testers not at Syndcon All

entry.title: PY18 Sprint 2 Review and Retrospective
entry.content:
Review

Claiming Done

  • BIZ-01: Prep books for taxes
  • BIZ-06: Meet with SBDC Innovation and Commercialization Assistance Program
  • SME-08: Publish at least one blog post in Jan.
  • V04-22: Load Adafruit wing design into CircuitMaker
  • V04-23: Modify Adafruit Wing to handle the required components and have the necessary headers
  • V04-25: Order initial test run of board for Wing
  • V04-26: Assemble a test Wings to verify design (on proto-wing)
  • V04-28: Design a housing in Fusion 360 for the sensor and TRRS jack (Sensor Housing)
  • V04-58: Implement hardware versioning system that can be detected by Holoseat software
  • V10-03: Research sensor mount adhesives
  • V10-04: Test mount adhesive
  • V10-05: Select mount adhesive

Not Claiming Done

  • BIZ-02: Mid Year Planning - Review/Groom User Stories and Backlog*
  • BIZ-05: Communication Plan*
  • PIC-01: Submit application to Crowd Supply to see if they would be interested in Holoseat*
  • SME-09: Publish at least one blog post in Feb
  • V04-13: Test the tone rings against the behavior of the existing 12 pole 3D printed design (at least same performance, but looking for faster response times and improved single stepping)
  • V04-14: Select tone ring based on ease to adapt, costs, identical or faster response times, improved single step
  • V04-57: Implement about screen to include versions, licensing, and other required information for all major elements of the Holoseat (SW,HW,FW,HSP,REST API)

Blocked

  • BIZ-03: Work with Legal on Trademark Filing
  • BIZ-04: Work with legal on finalizing any updates to testing agreement

Retrospective

What went well?

  • Sprint was going well (good pace and on target) until the last 3 weeks

What did not go well?

  • The last 3 weeks things almost came to a grinding halt (external issues overcame both J and Bryan)
  • Really concerned about all things communications (blog posts are still infrequent and we need to get the comms plan done!)

Note: we are very close to the SyndCon prep sprint

What can we do better?

  • Be ruthless about prioritizing tasks while we are ultra-bandwidth limited (highest priority is to ship the alphas)

entry.title: PY18 Sprint 2 Stand Up 7
entry.content:
J's Report

  • Did
    • V04-13: Test the tone rings against the behavior of the existing 12 pole 3D printed design (at least same performance, but looking for faster response times and improved single stepping) - started work on converting new tone ring to tool-free design including 2 iterations; confirmed the basic idea will work, but need a mechanical latching connection instead of magnetic latching to make it stay on axle
    • V04-28: Design a housing in Fusion 360 for the sensor and TRRS jack (Sensor Housing) - verified sensor housing height is correct; just need to upload CAD files and this PBI will be done
  • Will do
    • SME-09: Publish at least one blog post in Feb - will get this blog post done
    • Review email to alpha testers
  • Blocked?
    • Not really, but about to be on travel for 7 days, so almost no capacity

Bryan's Report

  • Did
    • V04-23: Modify Adafruit Wing to handle the required components and have the necessary headers -
    • V04-25: Order initial test run of board for Wing - done!
    • V04-26: Assemble a test Wings to verify design (on proto-wing) - from a design standpoint, this is done; Bryan to wrap up soldering headers on J's board for dev purposes
    • BIZ-03: Work with Legal on Trademark Filing - got response back
    • BIZ-04: Work with legal on finalizing any updates to testing agreement - got response back
  • Will do
    • Finish J's proto-wing board soldering and ship components to J
    • BIZ-03: Work with Legal on Trademark Filing - publish updated logos
    • PIC-01: Submit application to Crowd Supply to see if they would be interested in Holoseat - start researching surface mount shops
  • Blocked?
    • none

entry.title: PY18 Sprint 2 Stand Up 6
entry.content:
J's Report

  • Did
    • V10-04: Test mount adhesive - printed a test article of the sensor mount, attached to a non-critical location on bike, allowed it to cure, and stress tested the bond; complete success!!
  • Will do
    • V04-13: Test the tone rings against the behavior of the existing 12 pole 3D printed design (at least same performance, but looking for faster response times and improved single stepping) - start work on converting new tone ring to tool-free design
    • SME-09: Publish at least one blog post in Feb - finish draft blog post
  • Blocked?
    • Recovering from being sick, so less blocked than have very little capacity

Bryan's Report

  • Did
    • V04-58: Implement hardware versioning system that can be detected by Holoseat software - test done and passed!
    • V04-23: Modify Adafruit Wing to handle the required components and have the necessary headers - completed layout, need review then can claim done
    • BIZ-03: Work with Legal on Trademark Filing - got corrected image files of updated logo
  • Will do
    • BIZ-03: Work with Legal on Trademark Filing - follow up with legal; publish updated logos
    • BIZ-04: Work with legal on finalizing any updates to testing agreement - follow up with legal
    • V04-25: Order initial test run of board for Wing - place order
    • V04-26: Assemble a test Wings to verify design (on proto-wing) - build J's wing and sent out to J
    • PIC-01: Submit application to Crowd Supply to see if they would be interested in Holoseat - start researching surface mount shops
  • Blocked?
    • BIZ-03: Work with Legal on Trademark Filing - waiting on legal
    • BIZ-04: Work with legal on finalizing any updates to testing agreement - waiting on legal

Note:
Completing V10-04 also let us knock out two more PBIs

  • V10-03: Research sensor mount adhesives
  • V10-05: Select mount adhesive

entry.title: PY18 Sprint 2 Stand Up 5
entry.content:
J's Report

  • Did
    • V04-13: Test the tone rings against the behavior of the existing 12 pole 3D printed design (at least same performance, but looking for faster response times and improved single stepping) - got magnets, printed full disc tone ring, assembled test tone ring, and tested it; got clear signals to sensor!
  • Will do
    • V04-13: Test the tone rings against the behavior of the existing 12 pole 3D printed design (at least same performance, but looking for faster response times and improved single stepping) - start work on converting new tone ring to tool-free design
    • SME-09: Publish at least one blog post in Feb - finish draft blog post
    • BIZ-05: Communication plan - read "defining customer" and "marketing plan for makers" blog posts
    • V10-04: Test mount adhesive - will print a test article of the sensor mount, attach to a non-critical location on bike, allow to cure, and then stress test the bond
  • Blocked?
    • none, but at reduced capacity next week

Bryan's Report

  • Did
    • V04-22: Load Adafruit wing design into CircuitMaker - done
    • V04-23: Modify Adafruit Wing to handle the required components and have the necessary headers - very close to having this done (down to just a few more connections
  • Will do
    • V04-23: Modify Adafruit Wing to handle the required components and have the necessary headers - will complete v1 Rev 2 wing design file in CircuitMaker
    • BIZ-03: Work with Legal on Trademark Filing - follow up with legal; get corrected PNGs of updated logo
    • BIZ-04: Work with legal on finalizing any updates to testing agreement - follow up with legal
    • V04-58: Implement hardware versioning system that can be detected by Holoseat software - will wrap up by running ohm test sketch on test wing
  • Blocked?
    • BIZ-03: Work with Legal on Trademark Filing - waiting on legal
    • BIZ-04: Work with legal on finalizing any updates to testing agreement - waiting on legal

entry.title: PY18 Sprint 2 Stand Up 4
entry.content:
J's Report

  • Did
    • V04-13: Test the tone rings against the behavior of the existing 12 pole 3D printed design (at least same performance, but looking for faster response times and improved single stepping) - ordered and received new magnets for testing
    • V04-58: Implement hardware versioning system that can be detected by Holoseat software - sorted out wiki updates
    • SME-09: Publish at least one blog post in Feb - wrote outline and intro (needed access to ODE to do any other work, but was on a plane)
    • V04-26: Assemble a test Wings to verify design (on proto-wing) - sent Bryan ohm arduino sketch to verify hw version circuit
  • Will do
    • V04-13: Test the tone rings against the behavior of the existing 12 pole 3D printed design (at least same performance, but looking for faster response times and improved single stepping) - work on test assemblies with new magnets and CAD model
    • SME-09: Publish at least one blog post in Feb - keep working on draft post
  • Blocked?
    • none

Bryan's Report

  • Did
    • V04-23: Modify Adafruit Wing to handle the required components and have the necessary headers - had some issues with CircuitMaker, so did layout on printed hardcopy; hand layout is done; did layout with an eye toward next revision (SMT version)
    • BIZ-03: Work with Legal on Trademark Filing - got updated logo images
  • Will do
    • V04-23: Modify Adafruit Wing to handle the required components and have the necessary headers - put the layout into CircuitMaker
    • BIZ-03: Work with Legal on Trademark Filing - update production logos with new images
    • Working on draft message to alpha testers about status of hardware
  • Blocked?
    • Issues with importing files into CircuitMaker

entry.title: PY18 Sprint 2 Stand Up 3
entry.content:
• J's Report*
  • Did
    • SME-08: Publish at least one blog post in Jan. - published this post
    • V04-28: Design a housing in Fusion 360 for the sensor and TRRS jack (Sensor Housing) - All but done
    • V04-13: Test the tone rings against the behavior of the existing 12 pole 3D printed design (at least same performance, but looking for faster response times and improved single stepping) - discovered issue with magnet strength while testing sensor inside sensor housing; began redesign of tone ring for stronger magnets and sourced new magnets
  • Will do
    • V04-13: Test the tone rings against the behavior of the existing 12 pole 3D printed design (at least same performance, but looking for faster response times and improved single stepping) - order small batch of new magnets for R&D of tone ring
    • V04-58: Implement hardware versioning system that can be detected by Holoseat software - start reorganizing wiki pages around about page/versioning plan
    • SME-09: Publish at least one blog post in Feb - start drafting last post in current series
    • V04-26: Assemble a test Wings to verify design (on proto-wing) - send Bryan ohm arduino sketch to verify hw version circuit
  • Blocks?
    • none, but at reduced capacity due to travel (need to reschedule stand up)

Bryan's Report

  • Did
    • V04-26: Assemble a test Wings to verify design (on proto-wing) - fixed TRRS jack wiring and added version circuit on board 1 (board 1 is complete)
    • BIZ-03: Work with Legal on Trademark Filing - met with J, gave feedback to graphic artist about image fixes (waiting for updates), gave go ahead to legal
    • V04-13: Test the tone rings against the behavior of the existing 12 pole 3D printed design (at least same performance, but looking for faster response times and improved single stepping) - dropped due to findings above
    • BIZ-06: Meet with SBDC Innovation and Commercialization Assistance Program - done
  • Will do
    • V04-23: Modify Adafruit Wing to handle the required components and have the necessary headers - research board layout and start layout work
  • Blocks?
    • none

entry.title: PY18 Sprint 2 Stand Up 2
entry.content:
J's Report

Note: Over estimated capacity this week (needed recovery time from travel), so only got about half of committed work done.

  • Did
    • V04-13: Test the tone rings against the behavior of the existing 12 pole 3D printed design (at least same performance, but looking for faster response times and improved single stepping) - sent Bryan a set of tone ring parts
    • SME-08: Publish at least one blog post in Jan. - got about half of draft post moved over to wordpress (needs way more editing than I realized)
  • Will do
    • SME-08: Publish at least one blog post in Jan. - will finish and publish this post
    • V04-28: Design a housing in Fusion 360 for the sensor and TRRS jack (Sensor Housing) - start working on the CAD model
  • Blocks
    • none

Bryan's Report

  • Did
    • V04-26: Assemble a test Wings to verify design (on proto-wing) - Built Wing other than version circuit which required parts that had not arrived
    • BIZ-01: Prep books for taxes - done
    • BIZ-03: Work with Legal on Trademark Filing - met with legal
  • Will do
    • V04-26: Assemble a test Wings to verify design (on proto-wing) - Add version circuit to first wing, work out layout to improve second wing, start building second wing
    • BIZ-03: Work with Legal on Trademark Filing - Work w/ J to decide what we want to do trademark wise to push that forward; Get circle R changed to TM on logos
    • Ship Parts to J
    • V04-13: Test the tone rings against the behavior of the existing 12 pole 3D printed design (at least same performance, but looking for faster response times and improved single stepping) - Put new tone ring together
  • Blocks
    • none
